SEARCH
Package address

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
address.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
The Menu class handles the interaction with the user, including displaying the menu, adding, deleting, searching, and displaying contacts in the address book.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add()
    Adds a new contact to the address book by prompting the user to enter contact details.
    void

    Prompts the user to enter the last name of the contact to delete and deletes the contact.

    Displays the main menu options to the user.

    • Menu

      public Menu()

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu options to the user.

    • readContactFromTextFile

      public void readContactFromTextFile()
      Prompts the user to enter the filename and reads contacts from the specified text file.

    • add

      public void add()
      Adds a new contact to the address book by prompting the user to enter contact details. Retries on error.

    • isDataValidated

      public AddressEntry isDataValidated(String name, String lastName, String street, String city, String state, int postalCode, String email, String phone) throws Exception
      Validates the entered contact details and returns a new AddressEntry object.
      Parameters:
      name - the first name of the contact.
      lastName - the last name of the contact.
      street - the street address of the contact.
      city - the city of the contact.
      state - the state of the contact.
      postalCode - the postal code of the contact.
      email - the email address of the contact.
      phone - the phone number of the contact.
      Returns:
      a new AddressEntry object with validated data.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any validation fails.

    • deleteAddressEntry

      public void deleteAddressEntry() throws Exception
      Prompts the user to enter the last name of the contact to delete and deletes the contact.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during deletion.

    • selectEntryToDelete

      public static void selectEntryToDelete(ArrayList<AddressEntry> contactsToDelete, String lastName) throws Exception
      Prompts the user to select a contact to delete from the list of found contacts.
      Parameters:
      contactsToDelete - the list of contacts to delete.
      lastName - the last name of the contact to delete.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during deletion.

    • searchContact

      public void searchContact() throws Exception
      Prompts the user to enter a last name or part of it to search for contacts.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the search.
